text: In April of that year his frst wife's brother-in-law, the diplomatist Lord Ponsonby; had written to advise Anglesey to give the system a trial, adding that it was cultivated with extraordinary success in France and Italy and that he himself was being treated under a doctor who had studied under its founder , the Dr. Samuel Hahnemann. ln Opn 4 J8nad Y8ar Jv &inl WR'^ Bstolker An dipl malik Bod Jua Wrlan Ao aduxs Lo %u Jlh 0 Ynia 8a N uo clliuatea 6ifph oxlac Duccoy N fance ond and Ahha 8e Juimaoq Ux Jaaka Under 0 dodor UMo hog Sudieq under in founker {ke aq9 Samua ARhneman .
